author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...TROPICAL STORM DEXTER FORMS OVER THE WESTERN ATLANTIC... ...FORECAST TO MOVE AWAY FROM THE U.S. COAST AND STAY NORTH OF BERMUDA...
summary: ...TROPICAL STORM DEXTER FORMS OVER THE WESTERN ATLANTIC... ...FORECAST TO MOVE AWAY FROM THE U.S. COAST AND STAY NORTH OF BERMUDA... As of 11:00 PM AST Sun Aug 03 the center of Dexter was located near 34.3, -69.4 with movement ENE at 12 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1002 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 45 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Storm Dexter (AT4/AL042025)
